title: Things that you should say on typohile
content:
Strange, innit?  
What you should not say sorta generates talk. How bout really saying things clear, like:  
Yes, “Neville Brody was really surface supercrap from the beginning etc.??”. I mean, let’s really talk about things ....  
jesper

 [‹ Why is InDesign CS converting fonts into CID?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007162632/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13023 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need a font manager ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007162632/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13028 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jesper

comments.content:
The word ’please’ could be used more, in my opinion.  
(Please disregard if not appropriate...)
and after a few of these comments, an “i’m sorry” might be appropriate in a couple of instances.
